title: Weekend at Party Pier
description: Rick and Anita are expecting a fun vacation at Party Pier, but something troubling looms on the horizon. An invasion!
altHero: at a beach party, a woman, Anita, and her boyfriend, Rick, have a disagreemnt while another man, Goofball, dances
alt1: women in swimsuits dance at the beach
alt2: Anita and Goofball dance in front of the Shrimp Shack
alt3: rock band The Wonders cameo as Captain Geech & The Shrimp Shack Shooters
alt4: Goofball grasps his head, frightened, looking out at the ocean
